statements: SELECT * FROM referral_patterns;
SELECT referral_id, patient_id, referral_date FROM referral_patterns;
SELECT patient_id, referral_date, referred_physician_id FROM referral_patterns WHERE referring_physician_id = 101;
SELECT * FROM referral_patterns WHERE referral_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT patient_id, referred_physician_id FROM referral_patterns ORDER BY referred_physician_id ASC, patient_id DESC;
SELECT referral_id, referral_date, patient_id, referring_physician_id, referred_physician_id FROM referral_patterns WHERE patient_id = 12345;
SELECT * FROM referral_patterns WHERE referral_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT patient_id, COUNT(referral_id) AS num_referrals FROM referral_patterns GROUP BY patient_id HAVING COUNT(referral_id) > 1;
SELECT referral_id, referral_date FROM referral_patterns ORDER BY referral_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT referring_physician_id, COUNT(referral_id) AS num_referrals FROM referral_patterns GROUP BY referring_physician_id ORDER BY num_referrals DESC;
SELECT * FROM referrals WHERE patient_id = 1234;
SELECT referral_id, doctor_id, referral_date FROM referrals ORDER BY referral_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM referrals WHERE referral_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT scheme_name, kickback_amount FROM kickback_schemes WHERE provider_id = 5678;
SELECT referral_id, patient_id, doctor_id, referral_date FROM referrals WHERE patient_id = 5678;
SELECT * FROM referrals WHERE doctor_id = 123 AND referral_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT referral_id, referral_date FROM referrals WHERE patient_id = 456 ORDER BY referral_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_referrals FROM referrals;
SELECT * FROM kickback_schemes WHERE kickback_amount > 1000 ORDER BY scheme_name ASC;
SELECT scheme_id, provider_id, SUM(kickback_amount) AS total_kickbacks FROM kickback_schemes GROUP BY scheme_id, provider_id HAVING total_kickbacks > 5000;
SELECT * FROM referrals WHERE referral_id = 1;
SELECT referral_id, patient_id, referral_date FROM referrals WHERE patient_id = 100;
SELECT physician_name, specialty FROM physicians ORDER BY physician_name DESC;
SELECT referring_physician_id, referred_physician_id, kickback_amount FROM kickbacks WHERE kickback_amount > 500;
SELECT location, specialty, physician_name FROM physicians WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM physicians WHERE specialty = 'Cardiology';
SELECT physician_name, specialty, location FROM physicians WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT referral_id, referral_date FROM referrals WHERE referral_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';

SELECT physicians.physician_name, referrals.referral_date, kickbacks.kickback_amount FROM physicians JOIN referrals ON physicians.physician_id = referrals.referring_physician_id JOIN kickbacks ON physicians.physician_id = kickbacks.referring_physician_id;

SELECT referrals.referral_id, physicians.physician_name AS referring_physician, physicians_physician_name AS referred_physician FROM referrals JOIN physicians ON referrals.referring_physician_id = physicians.physician_id JOIN physicians AS physicians_physician ON referrals.referred_physician_id = physicians_physician.physician_id;
SELECT * FROM referrals ORDER BY referral_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT patient_name, patient_gender FROM patients WHERE patient_gender = 'F';
SELECT physician_name, specialty, hospital_affiliation FROM physicians WHERE specialty = 'Cardiology';
SELECT referral_id, patient_id, physician_id, referral_date FROM referrals WHERE referral_reason LIKE '%Consultation%';
SELECT patient_name, patient_dob FROM patients WHERE EXTRACT(YEAR FROM patient_dob) > 1990;
SELECT * FROM referrals WHERE referral_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY patient_id ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT patient_name, patient_dob, patient_gender FROM patients WHERE patient_gender = 'F' ORDER BY patient_dob DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT physician_name, specialty, hospital_affiliation FROM physicians WHERE specialty = 'Cardiology' AND hospital_affiliation LIKE '%Hospital%'
SELECT * FROM referrals r INNER JOIN physicians p ON r.physician_id = p.physician_id WHERE p.physician_name LIKE 'Dr.%'

SELECT * FROM kickbacks k LEFT JOIN physicians p ON p.physician_id = ANY(k.involved_physicians) LEFT JOIN referrals r ON r.referral_id = ANY(k.involved_referral_ids) ORDER BY kickback_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_gender FROM patients WHERE patient_dob > '1990-01-01';
SELECT doctor_name, doctor_specialty FROM doctors ORDER BY doctor_specialty DESC;
SELECT patient_name, referral_date FROM patients INNER JOIN referrals ON patients.patient_id = referrals.patient_id;
SELECT doctor_name, SUM(amount) AS total_payments FROM doctors INNER JOIN payments ON doctors.doctor_id = payments.referral_id GROUP BY doctor_name;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE patient_gender = 'M'
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, patient_dob, patient_phone FROM patients ORDER BY patient_name DESC
SELECT doctor_name, doctor_specialty, doctor_hospital, COUNT(referral_id) FROM doctors LEFT JOIN referrals ON doctors.doctor_id = referrals.doctor_id GROUP BY doctor_id
SELECT patient_name, referral_reason FROM patients INNER JOIN referrals ON patients.patient_id = referrals.patient_id WHERE referral_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT doctor_name, SUM(amount) AS total_payments FROM doctors LEFT JOIN payments ON doctors.doctor_id = payments.referral_id GROUP BY doctor_id HAVING total_payments > 1000
